byline.contributor: Alain Delaquérière contributed research from New York.

abstract: Chicago police are still trying to determine whether video circulated widely on social media documents moment of shooting of 30-year-old known gang member who was shot and is in critical condition.

headline.print_headline: Does Video Give Glimpse of Violent Year in Chicago?
headline.main: Does a Video Glimpse Into Chicago’s Year of Violence?

snippet: It is a jarring, disturbing, highly cinematic video, and the police are trying to determine whether it really is what it looks like: a selfie video that inadvertently recorded the man’s own shooting.
lead_paragraph: It is a jarring, disturbing, highly cinematic video, and the police are trying to determine whether it really is what it looks like: a selfie video that inadvertently recorded the man’s own shooting.
